about.madrasaHistory: Madrasa Arabia Tajweedul Quran is located in Masauni, Post Office Kalinjar, Tehsil Naraini, District Banda (UP). Surrounded by hills and a renowned heritage site (Kalinjar Fort), this area of Masauni was considered backward in terms of religion, education, and morality. The great Islamic scholar, Hazrat Allama, Faqih-e-Millat, Hazrat Maulana Syed Qari Siddiq Ahmad Sahab Bandwi (Rahmatullah Alaih), along with Mufti Mahmoodul Hasan Sahab Deobandi (Rahmatullah Alaih), and their disciple and the founder of this madrasa, Hazrat Maulana Syed Siddiq Ahmad Masauni (Rahmatullah Alaih), laid the foundation of this madrasa in 1984 (1404 Hijri).
about.founderDedication: Hazrat Maulana Syed Siddiq Ahmad Masauni (Rahmatullah Alaih) had a deep devotion to Islam and a fervent desire to revive the Sunnah. He started this madrasa in the courtyard of his own home to provide a sacred space where Muslim children could learn to recite the Holy Quran with proper **Tajweed** (pronunciation rules). With the support of local people and the generosity of sincere Muslims, this holy institution came into existence. After him, the responsibility of running the madrasa was entrusted to the current principal, **Hazrat Maulana Syed Abdul Tawwab Sahab**. Since then, under the supervision of virtuous and sincere individuals, the madrasa has been continuously progressing. By the grace of Allah, it is a remarkable example of religious and educational progress for the region and surrounding areas.
about.currentStatus: The madrasa is engaged in its noble mission with sincerity and determination. Currently, it has **26 teachers** and approximately **515 students**, along with **13 branches** in the surrounding areas, whose expenses are also managed by the madrasa. In addition to religious education, provisions are made for modern and academic studies. The madrasa's expenses are entirely dependent on the generosity of Muslims, as it has no permanent source of income.
about.educationDetails: Currently, around 515 students are studying here. Every year, approximately 80-100 students complete Nazra Quran (recitation with Tajweed). Additionally, the madrasa offers **Hifz** and **Aalimiyat** departments. All these courses are maintained through the curriculum of **Darul Uloom Nadwa, Lucknow**. The madrasa also has several departments and courses that help students shine like diamonds in the future. These children then become a source of joy for their parents and a means of continuous reward for the madrasa's founders.
about.girlsSectionText: Madrasa Arabia Tajweedul Quran also runs an Islamic institution for girls, currently operating in a small house with a total of 90 female students, all from the local area. People from surrounding areas and various cities wish to send their daughters to this institution for girls, but due to the lack of residential and hostel facilities, we are unable to cover their expenses or provide them with proper comfort. However, the educational facilities are excellent and as good or better than those provided for boys. By the grace of Allah and through your prayers, land for the madrasa has already been acquired. Now, only the construction of the building and other necessary tasks remain, for which we need your good wishes and participation in this project.
about.founderMessageText1: I feel proud and honored to introduce the services of Madrasa Arabia Tajweedul Quran, located in Village Masauni, Post Office Kalinjar, Tehsil Naraini, District Banda (UP) 210129, India.
about.founderMessageText2: In 1984, I was deeply saddened to see the trend of Muslims in my village and surrounding areas converting to other religions, with some already having left Islam. I realized this was due to the absence of a madrasa providing Islamic education.
about.founderMessageText3: For me, education was never limited to mere literacy; it was a means of character building, nurturing the soul, and preparing future generations to walk the path shown by Allah ﷻ and His beloved Prophet Muhammad ﷺ. Inspired by the Prophet’s saying, 'Seeking knowledge is obligatory upon every Muslim (male and female),' I established this institution where children learn Islamic values such as honesty, compassion, humility, and respect.
about.founderMessageText4: Initially, I dedicated my spare time to teaching students. By the grace of Allah, generous individuals donated land, and construction began. We started with a few rooms with mud walls and tiled roofs, and students from outside started residing there. Over time, with the help of students, construction continued despite significant challenges.
about.founderMessageText5: The dedication of our teaching staff, who persevered despite limited resources, is commendable. May Allah grant them immense blessings (Ameen). May Allah make this effort successful and alleviate their difficulties (Ameen).
about.founderSignature: - Hazrat Maulana Syed Siddiq Ahmad Masauni (R.A), Founder
about.nazimMessageTitle: Message from Maulana Abdul Tawwab Sahab
about.nazimMessageText1: We respectfully inform all friends and concerned individuals that the esteemed founder of Madrasa Arabia Tajweedul Quran Masauni, Hazrat Maulana Syed Siddiq Ahmad Masauni (Rahmatullah Alaih), passed away on 6 June 2013 (1418 Hijri).
about.nazimMessageText2: Despite my hesitation and Maulana’s reservations, I was entrusted with the responsibility of carrying forward his legacy. Alhamdulillah, over the past twelve years, with the blessings of the founder, the guidance of our respected elders, and the support of well-wishers, I have continued this work, which has brought me a sense of fulfillment.
about.nazimMessageText3: Apart from the madrasa, we continuously strive to meet the religious and cultural needs of our community.
about.nazimMessageText4: Introduction to Madrasa Arabia Tajweedul Quran Masauni: We have created an introductory website with essential information, images, and my father’s appeal from 1984. We hope this will prove valuable for all well-wishers.
about.nazimMessageText5: I sincerely invite everyone to personally visit our institution. Your presence will be a source of inspiration. May Allah bless us all.

tajweed.name: Quran Tajweed
tajweed.summary: An in-depth program to master the recitation and rules of Tajweed.
tajweed.description: This program focuses on the accurate pronunciation of Arabic letters, understanding the rules of Tajweed, and reciting the Holy Quran beautifully. Students will learn both the theoretical and practical aspects of Tajweed to recite the Quran as it was revealed.
tajweed.prerequisites: Basic ability to read Arabic script.

naajrah.name: Primary Education (Nazra)
naajrah.summary: Foundational education for Quran recitation and basic Islamic knowledge.
naajrah.description: The Nazra program is designed for beginners, focusing on the foundations of Quran recitation with basic Tajweed rules.

hifz.name: Hifz (Quran Memorization)
hifz.summary: Dedicated program to memorize the entire Holy Quran.
hifz.description: The Hifz program is for students who wish to memorize the entire Quran. Under the guidance of experienced Huffaz, students will memorize the Quran systematically, focusing on accuracy, retention, and proper recitation.
hifz.prerequisites: Proficiency in reading the Quran with Tajweed.

aalimiyat.name: Five-Year Arabic Course (Aalimiyat)
aalimiyat.summary: Comprehensive study of Islamic sciences leading to scholarly expertise.
aalimiyat.description: The Aalimiyat program is a rigorous five-year course covering various Islamic sciences—Arabic language and grammar, Tafsir (Quranic exegesis), Hadith, Fiqh (Islamic jurisprudence), Usul al-Fiqh, and Islamic history.
aalimiyat.prerequisites: Completion of primary Islamic education or equivalent.

computerScience.name: Computer Science Department
computerScience.summary: Modern education in computer science alongside Islamic studies.
computerScience.description: This department offers a unique blend of traditional Islamic studies with modern computer science education. Students will learn programming, software development, and other IT skills.

ncertCourses.name: NCERT Courses
ncertCourses.summary: Integration of national curriculum with Islamic education.
ncertCourses.description: We offer NCERT-based courses to ensure our students receive a balanced education aligned with national educational standards.

bazmSiddiq.name: Bazm-e-Siddiq (Student Association)
bazmSiddiq.summary: Student association promoting leadership, public speaking, and extracurricular activities.
bazmSiddiq.description: Bazm-e-Siddiq is a student association that organizes various extracurricular activities, including debates, speeches, literary events, and community service projects.

arabicLiterature.name: Arabic Literature
arabicLiterature.summary: In-depth study of classical and modern Arabic literature.
arabicLiterature.description: This program provides an in-depth study of the rich history of Arabic literature—classical texts, poetry, and modern literary works.

majlisTalaba.name: Majlis-e-Talaba (Student Council)
majlisTalaba.summary: Student council managing student welfare and campus events.
majlisTalaba.description: Majlis-e-Talaba is the student council responsible for representing student interests and fostering a positive educational environment.

girlsEducation.name: Girls' Education
girlsEducation.summary: Dedicated Islamic and academic programs for girls.
girlsEducation.description: We offer specialized programs for girls, providing comprehensive Islamic education and academic subjects in a safe and supportive environment.

diningHall.summary: Nutritious and hygienic meals provided in a spacious dining facility.
diningHall.description: Our dining hall provides nutritious and hygienic meals for all students and staff.

playground.name: Playground
playground.summary: Extensive outdoor area for sports and recreation.
playground.description: Our campus includes a large playground equipped for various sports.

medicalRoom.name: Medical Room
medicalRoom.summary: On-campus medical facility with qualified staff for student healthcare.
medicalRoom.description: A dedicated medical room on campus provides first aid and basic healthcare services by qualified medical staff.

lectureHall.name: Lecture Hall
lectureHall.summary: Modern lecture halls equipped with audio-visual aids.
lectureHall.description: Our lecture halls are designed with modern audio-visual equipment, comfortable seating, and a conducive environment for presentations.

bigMessKitchen.name: Large Kitchen
bigMessKitchen.summary: Kitchen for large-scale meal preparation for the community.
bigMessKitchen.description: Our state-of-the-art kitchen is capable of preparing meals for a large number of students and staff.

tajweed.prerequisites: Basic ability to read Arabic script.

hifz.name: Hifz (Quran Memorization)
hifz.summary: Dedicated program to memorize the entire Holy Quran.
hifz.description: The Hifz program is for students who wish to memorize the entire Quran. Under the guidance of experienced Huffaz, students will memorize systematically.
hifz.prerequisites: Proficiency in reading the Quran with Tajweed.

hadith.name: Hadith Studies
hadith.summary: Study of the Prophet’s ﷺ traditions, their texts, methodology, and interpretation.
hadith.description: In-depth study of authentic Hadith collections, including Sahih Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, and other classical works. Students gain proficiency in Hadith sciences and their practical application.

fiqh.summary: Principles of Islamic jurisprudence and their practical application in daily life.
fiqh.description: This course covers worship, transactions, family matters, and contemporary issues. Students gain proficiency in legal reasoning and fatwa methodology.
fiqh.prerequisites: Advanced Arabic and basic Islamic studies.

arabic.name: Arabic Language
arabic.summary: Development of classical Arabic grammar, morphology, and comprehension skills.
arabic.description: This program covers Arabic grammar (Nahw), morphology (Sarf), rhetoric (Balagha), and literature—foundational for all Islamic studies.

library.name: Library Services
library.summary: Comprehensive catalog, reading rooms, and digital resources for research and study.
library.description: Modern library with over 15,000 books, manuscripts, and digital resources. Quiet study spaces and research support are available for students and faculty.

hostel.name: Student Hostel
hostel.summary: On-campus accommodation with comprehensive student welfare facilities.
hostel.description: Safe and comfortable accommodation for outstation students, including meals, study rooms, recreational facilities, and 24/7 supervision.

mosque.name: Campus Mosque
mosque.summary: Central place of worship for daily prayers and community programs.
mosque.description: Our beautiful campus mosque serves as the spiritual center. Regular congregational prayers, Friday sermons, and special programs are held throughout the year.
